author: Martin Parker
text:
I am currently reviewing updating and implementing a document retention policy for a large US metropolitan city and would welcome input as to what this document should include.  
As the in house project manager I have a short window of time to develop this policy and would like to receive any feedback or assistance asap
The policy will need to include retention times for various types of documents across many different administrations such as Transportation Planning, Policy, Operations, Permitting, Project Delivery,  and shared services such as HR, Legal, IT Finance & Administration.
Any other input that relates to a whole Document Management System (including electronic form) would also be welcomed
Many thanks for your help
title: Documentation Retention Policy
